channel.title: GolemXScape ALLSTAR [WITH PICS]
channel.description:
hello Moparscape i am here to advertise my server that i think deserves to be popular because of all the work ive put into it and all the people helping me. my server name is GolemXScape and its a great allstar based rsps i have already some player and staff, we need 1 admin. please help our economy out and our community by joining us. personally i love allstar and oldschool rsps because they have cool things to do on them and it reminds me of the day when runescape was ACTUALLY GOOD? so this server GolemXScape has been coded lots and i dont wanna say how hard it was to code all of it because i have worked so much on coding it and we have 15 players already. join our forums and talk with us in the chatbox. help us get bigger and enjoy www.golemxscape.smffy.com
HERE ARE SOME THINGS I ADDED TO THE SERVER... -::gamble takes you to gambling area -::roll 55x2 dicing -::2roll 70x3 dicing -::3roll 85x5 dicing -::bash takes you to a boss -::christmasevent (after january 7th it will be ::quest and will give different reward) -::agsmini win ags -::dclawmini win dragon claws -::lottery (purchase a lottery ticket at ::shops) -::phatmini win partyhat set -::diceinfo -::commands -::starter -::trade trding area -::random a random place -::feast another random place -::chill chill here for fun -::afk become afk -::drags dragons teletport -::jad -::kqueen -::dp drop parties hosted here -::cg (color game -another gambling method) -::rares kill the orks for rares -::maxhit determine your maxhit -::portals teleports you the where the portals are (also the death spawn) -::home customized home -::yell -::forums -::help
mod commands -::alert (warns the player who abused) -::staff (staffzone) -::az (staffzone) -::notedbarrows (gives barrows armour) -::mod (a mod kit) -::modarm (custom mod armour -fixed item slots) -::sz2 (other staffzone) -::bank -::kick
admin commands ::master gives 99 in all stats ::pure make you have pure stats ::ipban ipban player ::xteleto tele to a player ::xteletome make a player go to you ::god fly emote ::godoff stop flying ::pnpc turn into a npc ::alltome teleport all online players to you ::die die emote ::ekick kicking emote ::2fun funny emote 2 ::drunk emote to walk drunk ::funny funny emote ::zap emote that electricutes you ::live emote that makes u look alive? ::jump emote that makes u jump like a madman ::ufloat another emote ::boo another emote ::adminarm custom admin armour with item slot fixed ::rich 2147m cash ::bunny turn into a bunny and get bunny ears
owner commands: -::oboom super huge explosion around you -::ownerarm custom owner armour with fixed item slots -::givemod -::giveadmin -::giveowner -::lupdate latest update -::announce make an announcement -::opack gives some armour -::npc spawns npc -::cool -::ozone owner only zone -::lamp gives a lit bug lantern that is valuable -::pickup
pictures!!! [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iZsIe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/52IBp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/CzMID.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/G8mXe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lrj14.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/gw9zZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UvfPD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dDQTC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/5WiFX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/zrWdJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MpRqD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/lvVA8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xjyD8.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XwswA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iLZer.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/FAEQZ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WmRtF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cUKrE.png[/img] end pictures...
those were jut some pics of the server... join us!
fixes and other : -turn into bunny when u equip bunny ears -walk drunk when u hold bronze dagger -bronze dagger is strongest weapon ingame -turn into grim reaper when equip scythe -turn into gorilla when equip monkey gregree -do a cool emote when holding ags -funny emote when u run with bowsword in hands -added 1b tokens for the rich people -some custom staff armour -fixed some of the glitches -fixed some dupes -fixed item equip slots -i coded some auto dicers that will host dice games for you. All 50x2 and 50% chance. -lots of exiting things to do
THOSE are only some of the things i have added to the server there is much more, so come check us out at :
www.golemxscape.smffy.com
thank you for reading. -The owner OF GolemXScape -Owner GolemX

item.title: GolemXScape ALLSTAR [WITH PICS]
item.dc:creator: @luna-scape luna-scape
item.description:
@luna-scape wrote:

All those customs. My eyes

Mezzyscape562:

Why dont you explain this?
All i see are some loveed up trolls in a area with bank booths which arent rotated right :o

And u didnt added the capes correctly thats the reason for it to looks so loveed up when u teleport or sumthing.
,
I shud remove all those damn command and put your server features there.

But beside all this u did a good job i think
Oh and remove those fucked up tabarea sprite

Edit: i like ur name
V

Read full topic

item.title: GolemXScape ALLSTAR [WITH PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

OGolemX:

lol… i really think that this is the best allstar ive seen though…

When compared to unedited Allstar Bases? Sure, why not. There are more people that dislike Customs than those who like them. If you really want all of that Custom Content - you’ll need to make it outstanding and very original.

Read full topic

item.title: GolemXScape ALLSTAR [WITH PICS]
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

OGolemX:

i am here to advertise my server that i think deserves to be popular because of all the work ive put into it

You have probably invested some time into this, but that doesn’t mean that it deserves to be popular. No R.S.P.S. deserves to be popular actually. They deserve to be reliable and solid. People need to stop caring about their Server Population, because it doesn’t mean anything.

Read full topic

item.title: GolemXScape ALLSTAR [WITH PICS]
item.dc:creator: @OGolemX OGolemX
item.description:
@OGolemX wrote:

hello Moparscape i am here to advertise my server that i think deserves to be popular because of all the work ive put into it and all the people helping me. my server name is GolemXScape and its a great allstar based rsps i have already some player and staff, we need 1 admin. please help our economy out and our community by joining us. personally i love allstar and oldschool rsps because they have cool things to do on them and it reminds me of the day when runescape was ACTUALLY GOOD? so this server GolemXScape has been coded lots and i dont wanna say how hard it was to code all of it because i have worked so much on coding it and we have 15 players already. join our forums and talk with us in the chatbox. help us get bigger and enjoy
www.golemxscape.smffy.com

HERE ARE SOME THINGS I ADDED TO THE SERVER…
-::gamble takes you to gambling area
-::roll 55x2 dicing
-::2roll 70x3 dicing
-::3roll 85x5 dicing
-::bash takes you to a boss
-::christmasevent (after january 7th it will be ::quest and will give different reward)
-::agsmini win ags
-::dclawmini win dragon claws
-::lottery (purchase a lottery ticket at ::shops)
-::phatmini win partyhat set
-::diceinfo
-::commands
-::starter
-::trade trding area
-::random a random place
-::feast another random place
-::chill chill here for fun
-::afk become afk
-::drags dragons teletport
-::jad
-::kqueen
-::dp drop parties hosted here
-::cg (color game -another gambling method)
-::rares kill the orks for rares
-::maxhit determine your maxhit
-::portals teleports you the where the portals are (also the death spawn)
-::home customized home
-::yell
-::forums
-::help

mod commands
-::alert (warns the player who abused)
-::staff (staffzone)
-::az (staffzone)
-::notedbarrows (gives barrows armour)
-::mod (a mod kit)
-::modarm (custom mod armour -fixed item slots)
-::sz2 (other staffzone)
-::bank
-::kick

admin commands
::master gives 99 in all stats
::pure make you have pure stats
::ipban ipban player
::xteleto tele to a player
::xteletome make a player go to you
::god fly emote
::godoff stop flying
::pnpc turn into a npc
::alltome teleport all online players to you
::die die emote
::ekick kicking emote
::2fun funny emote 2
::drunk emote to walk drunk
::funny funny emote
::zap emote that electricutes you
::live emote that makes u look alive?
::jump emote that makes u jump like a madman
::ufloat another emote
::boo another emote
::adminarm custom admin armour with item slot fixed
::rich 2147m cash
::bunny turn into a bunny and get bunny ears

owner commands:
-::oboom super huge explosion around you
-::ownerarm custom owner armour with fixed item slots
-::givemod
-::giveadmin
-::giveowner
-::lupdate latest update
-::announce make an announcement
-::opack gives some armour
-::npc spawns npc
-::cool
-::ozone owner only zone
-::lamp gives a lit bug lantern that is valuable
-::pickup

pictures!!!

52IBp.png782×540

cUKrE.png786×542

end pictures…

those were jut some pics of the server…
join us!

fixes and other :
-turn into bunny when u equip bunny ears
-walk drunk when u hold bronze dagger
-bronze dagger is strongest weapon ingame
-turn into grim reaper when equip scythe
-turn into gorilla when equip monkey gregree
-do a cool emote when holding ags
-funny emote when u run with bowsword in hands
-added 1b tokens for the rich people
-some custom staff armour
-fixed some of the glitches
-fixed some dupes
-fixed item equip slots
-i coded some auto dicers that will host dice games for you. All 50x2 and 50% chance.
-lots of exiting things to do

THOSE are only some of the things i have added to the server there is much more, so come check us out at :

www.golemxscape.smffy.com

thank you for reading.
-The owner OF GolemXScape
-Owner GolemX
